text: Koly Kanté (born 11 November 1982 in Bamako) is a Malian football (soccer) defender. Kanté has a French passport and currently plays for Belasitsa Petrich after signing a contract in January 2008. He is a right back/midfielder. == External links == * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Malian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Angoulême-Soyaux Charente players Category:Tours FC players Category:Association football utility players Category:Centre Salif Keita players Category:Sportspeople from Bamako Category:UA Cognac players Category:Mali international footballers
title: Koly Kanté
